Requirements

Mexshape requires Matlab version R13 or higher.

Mexshape requires shapelib, or at least parts of it. Shapelib is distributed under the LGPL and can be found at http://dl.maptools.org/dl/shapelib/. It's uncertain to me from reading the LGPL if I can just package the few necessary files from shapelib along with mexshape or if I have to package the entire library. Since I definitely don't want to package the entire library, for now at least I will not distribute any part of shapelib. If someone knows the answer to this, please tell me!
